scenario: The global social media analytics market size was valued at USD 12,908.42 million in 2024 and is projected to grow from USD 15,898.01 million in 2025 to USD 81,494.11 million by 2033, growing at a CAGR of 23.16% over the forecast period (2025-2033). The market is driven by the growing emphasis on data-driven marketing and the increasing adoption of AI and machine learning integration. The cloud-based social media analytics solutions dominate the market, and large enterprises are the major users of these solutions. The sentiment analysis subsegment accounted for the largest market share in the function segment, and the sales & marketing management analysis subsegment accounted for the largest market share in the application segment. The BFSI sector accounted for the largest market share in the end-user segment. North America is the most significant global social media analytics market shareholder. Key players in the market include Salesforce, Hootsuite, Sprout Social, IBM Corporation, Oracle Corporation, Adobe Systems Incorporated, SAS Institute Inc., NetBase, Quid, Talkwalker, and Clarabridge.
